interests.title: Users interested in your pets (Total results: {{count}})

helpModal.title: Help
helpModal.firstDesc: Welcome to the interests page, here you can see the status of all the requests you were made by other users. There are four states: pending (it means you have not decided yet), accepted or rejected (you have decided to give the user that made the request the pet, using the corresponding buttons) and canceled (user has decided to cancel the request).
helpModal.secondDesc: To aid you in organizing the interests, fell free to use the filter tools on the left side.

modals.reserve: Are you sure you want to reserve this pet for this user? This action is irreversible, please choose carefully.
modals.acceptRequest:
PLEASE READ CAREFULLY:
Choosing this option will send an email to this user with your email, so you can directly arrange the terms of adoption. After clicking "I'm sure", you can't unaccept this request, thus completing the adoption process.
modals.rejectRequest: Are you sure you want to reject this request? This action is irreversible, please choose carefully.

messages.accepted: {{username}} was interested in {{petName}} and you accepted the request
messages.rejected: {{username}} was interested in {{petName}} and you rejected the request
messages.canceled: {{username}} was interested in {{petName}} and he canceled the request
